name: 2467:Another Chapter of History
description:
After getting her roof destroyed by neighbors, while lamenting her conditions a mysterious figure offers just the right amount of money to finance the repairs of the woman's home.

The errand job?:

To deliver her a book that has never been printed, its only existence being tied to the original manuscript. The story being:

The King's True Kingdom by Ohmar Dagaal.

With no other timely options, the merchant Nacnac sets off to Earth to the hidden library: Fractal

Can Nacnac obtain the book and sleep in her house again or will she fail and have to subject herself to a drenched bed for a month again?

2467: Another Chapter of History is a  kinetic novel with ~10k words totaling to around one hour of reading time.  

CONTROLS

-------------

After clicking the start button press the space key to advance text.

CREDITS

-------------

programming,artwork,non atmospheric bgm and writing: Badda Baraf

sfx and atmospheric bgm: https://www.zapsplat.com
